node.name: Tracklipse for Track+ Issue Tracker
node.shortdescription:
Tracklipse is an Eclipse plugin for the Track+ issue tracker. It provides a nice interface and enables developers to view their tasks, create new tasks including attachments, and edit existing tasks.
Tracklipse works via the Track+ SOAP web service interface. Therefore it is of no importance where the Track+ server is located.
node.body:
Tracklipse is an Eclipse plugin for the Track+ issue tracker. It provides a nice interface and enables developers to view their tasks, create new tasks including attachments, and edit existing tasks.
Tracklipse works via the Track+ SOAP web service interface. Therefore it is of no importance where the Track+ server is located.
